About Dean Vun

I am an Operations Management and Information Systems professional with extensive experience in logistics, warehouse operations, and inventory control. My career has centred around designing, implementing, and sustaining robust WMS-based environments that support both day-to-day operations and long-term business objectives.

How I Work

I focus on translating operational realities into practical system configurations and processes. This often means working closely with operations, IT, and external vendors to ensure that solutions are not only technically sound but also usable and sustainable for frontline teams.

My approach combines structured analysis, clear communication, and a strong emphasis on reliability, data integrity, and user adoption.

Experience Across Industries

Beyond logistics and supply chain, I have worked in international shipping and financial services, which has given me a broad understanding of service standards, compliance, and customer expectations across different industries.

  • Logistics and warehouse operations with FM Global Logistics and IDS Logistics Services.
  • International relocation and excess baggage logistics with Seven Seas Worldwide.
  • Customer service, telebanking operations, and team leadership with HSBC Electronic Data Processing.

Professional Strengths

  • End-to-end project management and coordination.
  • WMS implementation, optimisation, and user training.
  • Inventory control, cycle counting, and reconciliation.
  • Analytical problem-solving and data-driven decision-making.
  • Business continuity planning and operational resilience.

Personal Traits

  • Passion for continuous learning and personal growth.
  • Excellent cross-cultural communication skills.
  • International living experience and regional exposure.
  • Highly motivated, accountable, and results-driven.
  • Lively and cheerful personality with a strong sense of responsibility.
